class.name: AbilitySystemComponent
class.brief_description: Core component for managing abilities, attributes, and effects on an actor.
class.description: The [AbilitySystemComponent] (ASC) is the central hub for all gameplay-related logic on an actor. It manages abilities, attributes, and effects. [b]Example Usage:[/b] [codeblock] func _ready(): asc.give_ability(fireball_ability) asc.try_activate_ability_by_tag("ability.fireball") [/codeblock]

method.name: add_attribute_set
method.description: Adds an attribute set to this component.

method.name: add_tag
method.description: Adds a gameplay tag to this actor.

method.name: apply_gameplay_effect_spec_to_self
method.description: Applies a gameplay effect to this actor.

method.name: get_attribute_value
method.description: Returns the current value of an attribute.

method.name: get_cue_resource
method.description: Returns the registered cue resource for the given tag, or null if not found.

method.name: get_owned_tags
method.description: Returns the container of tags owned by this actor.

method.name: give_ability
method.description: Grants a new ability to the actor.

method.name: has_tag
method.description: Returns true if the actor has the specified tag.

method.name: is_montage_playing
method.description: Returns true if the given animation is currently playing on a sibling animation node.

method.name: make_outgoing_spec
method.description: Creates an effect spec that can be applied later.

method.name: play_montage
method.description: Plays an animation on sibling animation nodes.

method.name: register_cue_resource
method.description: Registers a cue resource to be dispatched when its tag is triggered via [method execute_cue].

method.name: register_task
method.description: Registers and activates an asynchronous gameplay task.

method.name: remove_tag
method.description: Removes a gameplay tag from the actor.

method.name: set_attribute_base_value
method.description: Sets the base value of an attribute.

method.name: try_activate_ability_by_tag
method.description: Tries to activate an ability that matches the given tag.

method.name: unregister_cue_resource
method.description: Unregisters the cue resource associated with the given tag.

signal.name: ability_failed
signal.description: Emitted when an ability fails to activate.

signal.name: attribute_changed
signal.description: Emitted when an attribute value changes.

signal.name: cooldown_ended
signal.description: Emitted when a cooldown period ends.

signal.name: cooldown_started
signal.description: Emitted when a cooldown period starts.

signal.name: effect_applied
signal.description: Emitted when a gameplay effect is applied.

signal.name: effect_removed
signal.description: Emitted when a gameplay effect is removed.

signal.name: gameplay_event_received
signal.description: Emitted when a gameplay event or cue is received.

signal.name: tag_changed
signal.description: Emitted when a tag is added or removed.
